net.gotev.uploadservice.http

Interface HttpConnection.RequestBodyDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryUploadTask, HttpUploadTask, MultipartUploadTask
    Enclosing interface:
    HttpConnection

    public static interface HttpConnection.RequestBodyDelegate
    Delegate called when the body is ready to be written.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBodyReady(BodyWriter bodyWriter)
      Handles the writing of the request body.

    • Method Detail

      • onBodyReady

        void onBodyReady(BodyWriter bodyWriter)
          throws IOException
        Handles the writing of the request body.
        Parameters:
        bodyWriter - object with which to write on the body
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while writing the body
